name: Spellbound 2
summary:
Spellbound 2 is the sequel to the highly popular spelling game Spellbound. Once you have honed your spelling skills challenge your friends with a range of exciting new multiplayer games!
Featuring all new and improved single player modes, innovative new mini-games and a great new look and feel, Spellbound 2 tests your spelling skills with 5000 words to master and also features numerous rewards and collectibles to further the gaming experience.
